titles.title: To amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to require grant recipients to comply with all applicable State and local laws requiring notification or reporting of child abuse, child molestation, sexual abuse, rape, incest, intimate partner violence, or human trafficking, and for other purposes.
Reporting Accountability and Abuse Prevention Act of 2019
Reporting Accountability and Abuse Prevention Act of 2019
Reporting Accountability and Abuse Prevention Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
